'''''Vinyar Tengwar 36''''' is the thirty-sixth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|35|37}}

==Contents==
* Cover: Marquette University MS Tolkien 3/8/2:5 verso (facsimile)✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''
* "The ''Entu, Ensi, Enta'' Declension"✫ — Christopher Gilson
* "Transitions in Translations: German Translations vs. Tolkien's 'Guide to Names', Part II - Names of Places and Names of Things" (column) — Arden R. Smith

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
